_header: Be glad of all maidens flower
Subjects: Virgin Mary, joys of; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: A Hymn on the Seven Joys of the Virgin Mary in Heaven — eight 6-line stanzas (aabccb) and concluding quatrain (abab), a prayer

HunHM127.First Lines:
Be glad of al maydens flourreþat hast in heuene swich
                    honoureTo passe in hye blisse…
HunHM127.Last Lines:
…Be to me redy in þat strifLady y þe prayLady
                    for þese ioyes seueneAnd for þi gladnesse fiveBringe me to
                    þe blisse of heueneþorwe grace of clene lyfe
HunHM127.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.

         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 59-60.
Luria,  Maxwell Sidney,  and  Richard L. Hoffman, eds.

                    Lyrics.
